content: I do not have personal preferences but i can suggest that the first museum to visit will depend on your personal interests in art. if you are interested in seeing famous masterpieces such as the mona lisa, the louvre museum would be a great starting point. if you are more interested in impressionist art, then the musée d'orsay would be a good first stop. and if you are particularly fond of certain artists or art movements, you can choose the museum that features their works, such as the picasso museum, musée rodin or centre pompidou. ultimately, no matter which museum you choose to visit first, you will be able to witness some of the world's most famous and compelling art, history, and culture.
